channel.title: Ml on shotarok's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ml on shotarok's Tech Blog

item.title: 'Kaggle Display Advertising Challenge' working with vw-luigi
item.description: When you tackle some machine learning problems with vowpal wabbit, have you felt annoying to write monotonous evaluation code like cross-validation? vw-luigi (https://github.com/shotarok/vw-luigi) helps you at such time. The vw-luigi includes luigi workflows to evaluate models trained by vowpal wabbit. All you need to do is prepare for training and test data. If you use vw-luigi, it would train a model, predict with the model and you can get the evaluation result automatically.
